disclaimerData.disclaimer:
Hair styling is a cosmetic service that employs professional hair care products, tools, and methods to create a desired hairstyle. This may encompass cutting, blow-drying, curling, straightening, braiding, updos, and the application of chemical or heat-based treatments such as perms or keratin smoothing.

Your stylist will evaluate your hair type, condition, and personal preferences before beginning. Recommendations for ongoing maintenance and aftercare will be provided to help sustain results and promote hair health.

ANTICIPATED ADVANTAGES
Improved hair appearance, structure, and body
Personalized styling tailored to individual taste and occasion
Utilization of professional methods and high-quality products for a refined finish
Results that may be temporary or longer-lasting, depending on the technique chosen
Enhanced ease of hair management

POSSIBLE RISKS & SIDE EFFECTS
Although hair styling is generally considered safe, potential risks and side effects may include:
Temporary scalp irritation, redness, or sensitivity caused by styling products
Hair breakage or dryness resulting from excessive heat application
Allergic responses to hair products, such as sprays, gels, or treatment formulas
Unintended color alteration or fading due to heat or product interaction
Possible dissatisfaction with the final look, which may necessitate adjustments
These effects are typically mild and short-lived. If you have sensitive skin, a patch test is advised before using new products.

CONTRAINDICATIONS
Hair styling may not be suitable for individuals who:
Have scalp conditions like psoriasis, eczema, or open sores
Experience severe hair damage or significant hair loss
Have known allergies to specific hair product ingredients
Are particularly sensitive to heat from styling tools
Please inform your stylist of any concerns prior to the service.

DISCLAIMER & LIABILITY LIMITATION
Results from hair styling can vary based on hair type, texture, and condition.
The stylist will take appropriate measures to minimize damage, but I understand that repeated use of high heat, chemicals, or mechanical stress can impact hair health over time.
I confirm that I have disclosed all relevant hair and scalp conditions to the stylist.
I accept full responsibility for any allergic reactions or sensitivities that may occur.
I acknowledge that hair styling is an aesthetic service and results may not be permanent.

I confirm that I have been informed about all relevant aspects of this service and that I fully comprehend this advice. This includes information regarding:
- The reasons for undergoing the service and the desired results
- The inherent risks of the procedure itself
- The risks associated with declining the procedure
- Any risks specific to my personal health
- The anticipated benefits of the treatment
- Potential drawbacks or disadvantages
- Alternative options and their advantages and disadvantages, including the choice to have no treatment
- Any uncertainties and the probability of a successful outcome
- Any follow-up care that might be necessary

MEDICAL IMAGERY: I authorize the taking of clinical photographs and videos. I understand these will become part of my confidential medical records.

I have been asked what information I require to make an informed decision and have had the opportunity to discuss my goals in detail.

I certify that I have read this consent, understand it fully, have had ample opportunity for discussion, and all my questions have been answered to my satisfaction. No new information has come to light that affects my decision to undergo the service or provide my consent. I hereby consent to this procedure. This document constitutes the complete disclosure and supersedes any prior verbal or written information.

All deposits and booking fees are non-refundable unless otherwise agreed with the practitioner.

questions.content: Do you comprehend the details that have been given to you?
Do you believe enough information has been shared to allow you to give informed consent?
Have you given your consent voluntarily?
Are there any health issues you currently have?
Are you currently pregnant or nursing a child?
Do you suffer from a neuromuscular disorder (such as Multiple Sclerosis, ALS, motor neuropathy, myasthenia gravis, or Lambert-Eaton syndrome)?
Do you have an autoimmune condition?
Do you experience any skin problems?
Do you have any known allergies or a history of severe allergic reactions (anaphylaxis)?
Is there an active infection at the area where the procedure is planned?
Are you currently on any antibiotics or other prescribed medications?
Is there any other Medical or Social History we should be aware of? If yes, please explain in detail.
What are your goals and desired results for undergoing this procedure? Please elaborate.
Have you undergone this or a comparable treatment previously? If so, were there any issues? Please provide details.
Do you have any concerns? If so, please describe them.
Is there anything else we need to know? Please provide full information.
I will keep this information for the duration of my treatment and consult it as needed.
